alert.note: Alert for Southern Seward Peninsula Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 04 at 7:01PM AKST until March 05 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow, blowing snow, and mixed precipitation occurring. Plan on difficult travel conditions with visibilities one quarter mile or less at times. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches, and ice accumulations of a trace are expected. * WHERE...Southern Seward Peninsula Coast. * WHEN...Until 6 AM Saturday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting as high as 50 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Storm Warning for snow and blowing snow means severe winter weather conditions are occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.
